1764                                        case URI u -> String.valueOf(u);
1765                                        case Map<?, ?> m -> MapGetter._propertyString(m);
1766                                        case List<?> list -> ListGetter._propertyString(list);
1767                                        default -> throw new RuntimeException("Unable to convert to property string. value = " + value);
1768                                };
1769                        }
1770
1771                }
1772
1773                /**
1774                 * Sets up to converts a value.
1775                 * @param <U> value type
1776                 * @param mapper function.
1777                 * @return new property getter.
1778                 */
1779                default <U> PropertyGetter<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1780                        return new FuncGetter<T, U>(this, mapper, null);
1781                }
1782
1783                /**
1784                 * Fallback to value if property not found.
1785                 * @param fallback fallback value.
1786                 * @return new property getter.
1787                 */
1788                default RequiredPropertyGetter<T> orElse(T fallback) {
1789                        if (fallback == null) {
1790                                throw new NullPointerException();
1791                        }
1792                        return new FallbackGetter<T>(this, () -> fallback);
1793                }
1794
1795                /**
1796                 * Fallback to value if property not found.
1797                 * @param fallback supplier.
1798                 * @return new property getter.
1799                 */
1800                default RequiredPropertyGetter<T> orElseGet(Supplier<? extends T> fallback) {
1801                        if (fallback == null) {
1802                                throw new NullPointerException();
1803                        }
1804                        return new FallbackGetter<T>(this, fallback);
1805                }
1806
1807                /**
1808                 * A property getter that guarantees the result will not be missing usually
1809                 * because a non-null fallback is provided somewhere.
1810                 *
1811                 * @param <T> property type.
1812                 */
1813                public sealed interface RequiredPropertyGetter<T> extends ChildPropertyGetter<T> {
1814
1815                        /**
1816                         * This call unlike the parent returns a required result. {@inheritDoc}
1817                         */
1818                        RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, String key);
1819
1820                        /**
1821                         * Gets a result from properties by trying a list of keys.
1822                         * @param props properties.
1823                         * @param keys list of property keys usually dotted.
1824                         * @return result.
1825                         */
1826                        default RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, List<String> keys) {
1827                                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
1828                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Keys is empty");
1829                                }
1830                                String key = keys.getFirst();
1831                                return get(props, key);
1832                        }
1833
1834                        /**
1835                         * Sets up to converts a value.
1836                         * @param <U> value type
1837                         * @param mapper function.
1838                         * @return new property getter.
1839                         */
1840                        default <U> RequiredPropertyGetter<U> map(
1841                                        PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1842                                return new RequiredFuncGetter<T, U>(this, mapper, null);
1843                        }
1844
1845                        /**
1846                         * Creates a Property from the given key and this getter.
1847                         * @param key key.
1848                         * @return property.
1849                         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key is malformed.
1850                         */
1851                        default RequiredProperty<T> build(String key) throws IllegalArgumentException {
1852                                validateKey(key);
1853                                return new DefaultRequiredProperty<>(this, List.of(key));
1854                        }
1855
1856                        /**
1857                         * Creates a Property from the given key and its {@value LogProperties#NAME}
1858                         * parameter.
1859                         * @param key key.
1860                         * @param name interpolates <code>{name}</code> in property name with this
1861                         * value.
1862                         * @return property.
1863                         */
1864                        default RequiredProperty<T> buildWithName(String key, String name) {
1865                                var parameters = Map.of(NAME, name);
1866                                validateKeyParameters(key, parameters.keySet());
1867                                String fqn = LogProperties.interpolateKey(key, parameters);
1868                                return build(fqn);
1869                        }
1870
1871                }
1872
1873        }
1874
1875}
1876
1877abstract class AbstractLogPropertiesBuilder<T> {
1878
1879        protected abstract T self();
1880
1881}
1882
1883record DefaultProperty<T>(PropertyGetter<T> propertyGetter, List<String> keys) implements LogProperties.Property<T> {
1884
1885        public DefaultProperty {
1886                Objects.requireNonNull(propertyGetter);
1887                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
1888                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("should have at least one key");
1889                }
1890        }
1891
1892        /**
1893         * Gets the first key.
1894         * @return key.
1895         */
1896        public String key() {
1897                return keys.get(0);
1898        }
1899
1900        @Override
1901        public Result<T> get(LogProperties properties) {
1902                return propertyGetter.get(properties, keys);
1903        }
1904
1905        public <U> LogProperties.Property<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1906                return new DefaultProperty<>(propertyGetter.map(mapper), keys);
1907        }
1908
1909        public String propertyString(T value) {
1910                return propertyGetter.propertyString(value);
1911        }
1912
1913        public void set(T value, BiConsumer<String, T> consumer) {
1914                if (value != null) {
1915                        consumer.accept(key(), value);
1916                }
1917        }
1918
1919}
1920
1921record DefaultRequiredProperty<T>(RequiredPropertyGetter<T> propertyGetter,
1922                List<String> keys) implements LogProperties.RequiredProperty<T> {
1923
1924        public DefaultRequiredProperty {
1925                Objects.requireNonNull(propertyGetter);
1926                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
1927                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("should have at least one key");
1928                }
1929        }
1930
1931        /**
1932         * Gets the first key.
1933         * @return key.
1934         */
1935        public String key() {
1936                return keys.get(0);
1937        }
1938
1939        @Override
1940        public RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties properties) {
1941                return propertyGetter.get(properties, keys);
1942        }
1943
1944        public <U> LogProperties.RequiredProperty<U> map(
1945                        PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1946                return new DefaultRequiredProperty<>(propertyGetter.map(mapper), keys);
1947        }
1948
1949        public String propertyString(T value) {
1950                return propertyGetter.propertyString(value);
1951        }
1952
1953        public void set(T value, BiConsumer<String, T> consumer) {
1954                if (value != null) {
1955                        consumer.accept(key(), value);
1956                }
1957        }
1958
1959}
1960
1961record MapProperties(String description, Map<String, String> map) implements LogProperties {
1962
1963        @Override
1964        public @Nullable String valueOrNull(String key) {
1965                return map.get(key);
1966        }
1967
1968        @Override
1969        public String description(String key) {
1970                return description + " (" + key + ")";
1971        }
1972
1973}
1974
1975record FallbackGetter<T>(PropertyGetter<T> parent,
1976                Supplier<? extends T> fallback) implements RequiredPropertyGetter<T> {
1977
1978        @Override
1979        public RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
1980                var r = parent.get(props, key);
1981                RequiredResult<T> req = switch (r) {
1982                        case Result.Missing<T> m -> {
1983                                var f = fallback.get();
1984                                if (f == null) {
1985                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent) //
1986                                                .errorResult(props, key, new LogProperties.PropertyMissingException("fallback returned null"));
1987                                }
1988                                yield new Result.Success<>(f);
1989                        }
1990                        case Result.Success<T> s -> s;
1991                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e;
1992                };
1993                return req;
1994        }
1995
1996        @Override
1997        public String propertyString(T value) {
1998                return parent.propertyString(value);
1999        }
2000
2001}
2002
2003record MapGetter(RootPropertyGetter parent) implements ChildPropertyGetter<Map<String, String>> {
2004
2005        @Override
2006        public Result<Map<String, String>> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2007                return parent.get(props, key, (p, k) -> p.mapOrNull(k));
2008        }
2009
2010        @Override
2011        public String propertyString(Map<String, String> value) {
2012                return _propertyString(value);
2013        }
2014
2015        static String _propertyString(Map<?, ?> value) {
2016                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
2017                boolean first = true;
2018                for (var e : value.entrySet()) {
2019                        if (first) {
2020                                first = true;
2021                        }
2022                        else {
2023                                sb.append("&");
2024                        }
2025                        PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(e.getKey()), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
2026                        Object v = e.getValue();
2027                        if (v != null) {
2028                                sb.append("=");
2029                                PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(v), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
2030                        }
2031                }
2032                return sb.toString();
2033        }
2034
2035}
2036
2037record ListGetter(RootPropertyGetter parent) implements ChildPropertyGetter<List<String>> {
2038
2039        @Override
2040        public Result<List<String>> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2041                return parent.get(props, key, (p, k) -> p.listOrNull(k));
2042        }
2043
2044        public String propertyString(List<String> list) {
2045                return _propertyString(list);
2046        }
2047
2048        static String _propertyString(List<?> list) {
2049                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
2050                boolean first = true;
2051                for (var e : list) {
2052                        if (first) {
2053                                first = true;
2054                        }
2055                        else {
2056                                sb.append(",");
2057                        }
2058                        PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(e), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
2059                }
2060                return sb.toString();
2061        }
2062
2063}
2064
2065record FuncGetter<T, R>(PropertyGetter<T> parent, PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends R, ? super Exception> mapper,
2066                @Nullable PropertyFunction<? super R, ? extends String, ? super Exception> stringFunc)
2067                implements
2068                        ChildPropertyGetter<R> {
2069
2070        @Override
2071        public Result<R> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2072                var result = parent.get(props, key);
2073                return switch (result) {
2074                        case Result.Success<T> s -> {
2075                                try {
2076                                        R r = mapper._apply(s.value());
2077                                        if (r == null) {
2078                                                yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).missingResult(props, List.of(key));
2079                                        }
2080                                        yield new Result.Success<>(r);
2081                                }
2082                                catch (Exception e) {
2083                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).errorResult(props, key, e);
2084                                }
2085                        }
2086                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e.convert();
2087                        case Result.Missing<T> m -> m.convert();
2088                };
2089        }
2090
2091        @Override
2092        public String propertyString(R value) {
2093                var f = stringFunc;
2094                if (f != null) {
2095                        return f.apply(value);
2096                }
2097                return ChildPropertyGetter.super.propertyString(value);
2098        }
2099
2100}
2101
2102record RequiredFuncGetter<T, R>(RequiredPropertyGetter<T> parent,
2103                PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends R, ? super Exception> mapper,
2104                @Nullable PropertyFunction<? super R, ? extends String, ? super Exception> stringFunc)
2105                implements
2106                        RequiredPropertyGetter<R> {
2107
2108        @Override
2109        public RequiredResult<R> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2110                var result = parent.get(props, key);
2111                return switch (result) {
2112                        case Result.Success<T> s -> {
2113                                try {
2114                                        R r = mapper._apply(s.value());
2115                                        if (r == null) {
2116                                                throw new NullPointerException(
2117                                                                "The property function returned a null. props=" + props + ", key=" + key);
2118                                        }
2119                                        yield new Result.Success<>(r);
2120                                }
2121                                catch (Exception e) {
2122                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).errorResult(props, key, e);
2123                                }
2124                        }
2125                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e.convert();
2126                };
2127        }
2128
2129        @Override
2130        public String propertyString(R value) {
2131                var f = stringFunc;
2132                if (f != null) {
2133                        return f.apply(value);
2134                }
2135                return RequiredPropertyGetter.super.propertyString(value);
2136        }
2137
2138}
2139
2140interface ListLogProperties extends LogProperties {
2141
2142        @Override
2143        default @Nullable String valueOrNull(String key) {
2144                for (var props : properties()) {
2145                        var value = props.valueOrNull(key);
2146                        if (value != null) {
2147                                return value;
2148                        }
2149                }
2150                return null;
2151        }
2152
2153        default String description(String key) {
2154                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
2155                boolean first = true;
2156                for (var p : properties()) {
2157                        if (first) {
2158                                first = false;
2159                        }
2160                        else {
2161                                sb.append(", ");
2162                        }
2163                        sb.append(p.description(key));
2164                }
2165                return sb.toString();
2166        }
2167
2168        LogProperties[] properties();
2169
2170        default StringBuilder toString(StringBuilder sb) {
2171                sb.append(getClass().getSimpleName());
2172                sb.append("[properties=").append(Arrays.deepToString(properties())).append("]");
2173                return sb;
2174        }
2175
2176}
2177
2178record CompositeMutableLogProperties(LogProperties[] properties) implements ListLogProperties, MutableLogProperties {
2179
2180        @Override
2181        public MutableLogProperties put(String key, @Nullable String value) {
2182                for (var p : properties()) {
2183                        if (p instanceof MutableLogProperties mp && mp != this) {
2184                                mp.put(key, value);
2185                        }
2186                }
2187                return this;
2188        }
2189
2190        public String toString() {
2191                return toString(new StringBuilder()).toString();
2192        }
2193
2194}
2195
2196record CompositeLogProperties(LogProperties[] properties) implements ListLogProperties {
2197        public String toString() {
2198                return toString(new StringBuilder()).toString();
2199        }
